messages.zh: 拥有精良装备的敌人从四面八方出现，源源不断地发起进攻，毕竟你挡住了这里唯一的洞口。
messages.en: Well equipped enemies come from all directions. They attack relentlessly, after all, you have blocked the only way out.

messages.zh: 站住，凯尔希。
messages.en: Kalt’sit, stop.

messages.zh: 你回来了。
messages.en: You're back.

messages.zh: 现在你是想通了，还是怎么？
messages.en: Have you finally figured it out then?

messages.zh: 你想要这个对吧，拿去。
messages.en: You wanted this, right? Take it.

messages.zh: 你私自出动了。
messages.en: You went without permission.

messages.zh: 我不干涉干员的私事，也不会过问他们做了些什么，只要他们没有损害罗德岛的利益。
messages.en: I don't interfere with private affairs of operators or ask what they do, as long as they don't harm Rhodes Island's interests.

messages.zh: 希望你的行为不要有失你在罗德岛的身份，斯卡蒂。
messages.en: I hope you will act befittingly of your station at Rhodes Island, Skadi.

messages.zh: 冷嘲热讽就免了。规矩我很清楚，一物换一物。
messages.en: Let's skip the mocking. I know the rules, an exchange of one thing in return for another.

messages.zh: 你想要从我这里换到什么？
messages.en: What do you want from me?

messages.zh: 信息。
messages.en: Information.

messages.zh: 我所拥有的信息的价值，真有这么轻贱？
messages.en: Is my information only worth that much in your eyes?

messages.zh: 我可以立刻就把这块石头捏成碎片，你不想这样。
messages.en: I could crush this “rock” to pieces right away. You don't want that.

messages.zh: 但我知道你假称任务，去了卡西米尔的滴水村，还和其他干员发生了冲突。
messages.en: But, I know you pretended to be on a mission. You went to Droplet Village in Kazimierz and assaulted a fellow operator.

messages.zh: 那个孩子无论是在滴水村还是在罗德岛，都替你保守了秘密。
messages.en: That kid kept what you did in Droplet Village a secret, even after she returned to Rhodes Island.

messages.zh: 但我绝没有向你发布过任何类似的任务。
messages.en: But I am not easily fooled, I am certain that I have never given any similar missions to you.

messages.zh: 嗯？血已经注满了融芯。这不是你的血，你不敢在大地上流血。
messages.en: Hmm? The core is already filled with blood. This is not your blood, you dare not shed your own blood on the earth itself.

messages.zh: 是格拉尼的。
messages.en: It's Grani's.

messages.zh: 你已经做了这种事。
messages.en: You went that far?

messages.zh: 我会回报她，这不用你提醒。
messages.en: I'll return her a favor. You don't need to remind me.

messages.zh: 我知道你需要这东西，钥匙、核心、记忆块，随便它是什么。我必须弄到手。
messages.en: I know you need the following things, the key, the core, the memory piece, whatever it is. I will get it.

messages.zh: “颅腔”，“火肺”，“黄烟”，我全都解决了。
messages.en: “Cavitas Cranii”, “Ignius Pulmonarius”, “Nicotiana Rustica”, I took all of them down.

messages.zh: 否则，这东西早已落到他们手上了。
messages.en: Otherwise it would had fallen into their hands.

messages.zh: 而和他们交易的绝不会是你，因为你给不出他们要的东西，你不会做那种事。
messages.en: You will never be able to trade with them because you can't give them what they want. You will not do what I did to get the “rock”.

messages.zh: 你需要这块“石头”，我需要知道我想知道的东西。
messages.en: You need this “rock”, and I need to know what I want to know.

messages.zh: 你和你的种群让我感到可笑，我并不依赖任何一个零件去拼凑出大地的全貌。
messages.en: You and your race make me laugh, I don't rely on any one part to piece together the whole picture of the world.

messages.zh: 你与罗德岛由契约相连，你与我也当如是。
messages.en: You are bound to Rhodes Island by contract, and so are you to me.

messages.zh: 一物换一物。
messages.en: An exchange of one thing in return for another.

messages.zh: 难得看见你恼怒的样子。只有在这种时候，你才会一改平常的慵懒和颓废。
messages.en: So I struck a nerve. It’s rare to see you enraged. Only now will you divert from your usual lazy and apathetic attitude.

messages.zh: 你想知道幽灵鲨身上源石神经剂的来源。
messages.en: You want to know about where the originium nerve agent on Specter came from.

messages.zh: ——你是怎么知道的？
messages.en: ——How did you know that?

messages.zh: （阿戈尔语）“深海猎人血脉相连”。
messages.en: (Aegir language) “Abyssal Hunters are closely linked by blood”.

messages.zh: 我无所不知。
messages.en: I know everything.
....Tell me.

messages.zh: 可以。只要你听我的命令，我甚至会主动帮助你。前提是，你必须听从命令。
messages.en: I will, as long as you follow my orders. I'll even offer to help you, if you obey me well.

messages.zh: 我只相信可信之人。
messages.en: I only trust trustworthy people.

messages.zh: 我言而有信。
messages.en: I always keep my word.
